price: (32) Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him."
arabic: ثُمَّ فِي سِلۡسِلَةٖ ذَرۡعُهَا سَبۡعُونَ ذِرَاعٗا فَٱسۡلُكُوهُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: thumma fī sil'silatin dharʿuhā sabʿūna dhirāʿan fa-us'lukūhu
